title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 440.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 440.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish the
requirements to operate a program that provides high-quality residential care
and supportive services to children and youth aged 10 and older who have been
found to be, or are at risk of becoming, survivors of sex trafficking. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
440.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 9, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 10, eff. 3/9/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
